Text:
function EP02_10()

    --.承-4【4月第4週】「憂姫・伊草マリカ」
    SaveData.Title = "憂姫・伊草マリカ"

    --//BG：学食
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    MSG([[ One day, as April was drawing to a close with no progress in the investigation about my sister, I noticed a certain change in the cafeteria. ]])
    --//BU：ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0216.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “T-The Yasai Mashimashi Grilled Chicken Set Meal, recommended by Erika Ikusa...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, a poster recommending that set meal was posted at the entrance, featuring a photo of me eating it. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Right now, among the first-years, there’s a trend to challenge that set meal aiming to finish it completely, just like Sister Erika.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ehh!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, I could see those mountains of vegetables everywhere in the cafeteria. ]])

    MSG([[ I had thought the cafeteria lady was thanking me a lot lately — maybe because I had unknowingly contributed to their sales. ]])

    MSG([[ At an elite girls’ school, such a hearty menu becoming popular would normally be impossible... The influence of a "Princess" candidate is really amazing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “But because of that influence, the cafeteria is packed and hard to use... Everyone takes way too long to eat.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “That does feel a bit embarrassing.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】
 “Then, how about lunch in my room?” ]])
    -- //ダリア

    -- //CI：025・継続
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI025a")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ When I turned around, a suspicious person wearing a penguin mask was standing there. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ma")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Hyaa!?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】
 “Shh... I want to avoid causing a fuss and am hiding my presence.” ]])
    -- //ダリア

    -- //CI：025・終了
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “It’s me, Daria.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Daria-san...!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Under the mask, the face of Daria Himegami, one of the “Princesses” I met at the entrance ceremony, appeared. ]])

    MSG([[ I quickly covered her eyes with my hand so Hiyu wouldn’t make eye contact with her. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, I see. This mask also hides her powerful gaze. Still, it does seem like it makes her stand out even more. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //CI：025・継続
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI025a")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I want to apologize for the trouble I caused at the entrance ceremony. The cafeteria seems full, so won’t you two let me treat you to lunch?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “...You don’t have any other intentions?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I haven’t forgotten that time she almost kissed me. I don’t want to suspect her, but I can’t help but be on guard. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria nodded firmly in response to my question. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Back then I was just excited because I saw someone who looked like Marika’s cousin. I won’t harass you again. I promise.” ]])

    MSG([[ Because of the mask, I couldn’t feel any seriousness at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, Daria should know Marika Ikusa well. This is a chance to confirm the truth behind the story I heard before: that my sister put the boys’ division on suspension. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “N-No way anyone else is going. As a knight, I will protect Sister Erika!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Thank you, Hiyu-san. But since we were kindly invited, let’s accept the treat.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “S-Sister?! G-Gununu... If Sister says so...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Thanks. While everyone else is distracted by climbing the vegetable mountain, let’s go.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria winked and reached out her hand to us. ]])

    MSG([[ — I have to somehow get the story about my sister. Controlling my excitement, I placed my hand over hers. ]])

    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Ladies, please come this way.” ]])

    -- //CI：025・終了
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Daria led me to a room at the end of the first floor, the same floor as the cafeteria. The plaque on the door said "Disciplinary Committee Room." ]])
    --//BG：風紀委員室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG016aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）、ヒユ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")

    MSG([[ Inside, there were long tables and chairs, plus a whiteboard. The atmosphere was quite different from a classroom. ]])

    MSG([[ She encouraged us to sit down. Then from a refrigerator in the corner, she took out a water bottle and poured water into glasses. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Nice room, isn’t it? Actually, I’m also the head of the Disciplinary Committee, so we often discuss school discipline here.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “The food will arrive soon, so have some water while you wait.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ — No matter what food comes, I won’t be distracted! I steeled my resolve and waited for the meal. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    MSG([[ But five minutes later... ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG016aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    --//SE：お肉の焼ける音
PLAY_SE("SEb002.wav")
--WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “S-Steak!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG016ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Before us was a lavish steak! Juices popped from the hot iron plate, herb butter melted, and a meaty aroma teased my nostrils. ]])

    MSG([[ Neither Hiyu nor I could help but be flustered by such an unbelievable meal for a school setting, but Daria calmly picked up knife and fork and began eating. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “What’s wrong? This is one of the cafeteria's menu items—don’t hesitate to eat.” ]])

    MSG([[ Is that really true...? I’m not dazzled by the food, but I can’t not eat it. ]])

    MSG([[ Yeah, yeah. Not eating would be strange. I’ll enjoy the meal first. The talk comes after. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu and I exchanged looks, swallowed, and picked up our knives and forks. ]])

    --//SE：金属のぶつかる音（カチャカチャ）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
PLAY_SE("SEc013.wav")
WAIT(1000)

STOP_SE("SEc013.wav")
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “It’s amazing... the knife slices in smoothly, like cutting fruit.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “T-The fat melts juuuust right on my tongue! It's the first time I’ve ever eaten such delicious meat!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “It’s truly delicious, thank you very much, Daria-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I’m glad you like it. Make sure to drink water so you don’t choke, okay?” ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, Daria finished her meal, placed her knife and fork on the plate, and wiped her mouth with a napkin on her lap. ]])

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG016aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “It’s tough when your actions influence those around you, isn’t it?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0225.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “...Yes.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I was confused too when I became a ‘Princess’ candidate, so I understand how you feel.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “No one can enter this room without my permission. If you want a quiet place to eat, feel free to use it anytime.” ]])

    MSG([[ Since classes started two weeks ago, it’s been pretty tough—being asked about this and that by the knights, and approached familiarly by kids I didn’t know. ]])

    MSG([[ No doubt Daria-san has more worries as a 'Princess' than I do. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe because she understands my struggles, she is worried and invited me to eat like this...? ]])

    MSG([[ If that’s true, I’m sorry for having doubted her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Hehe, being here like this makes me nostalgic. It reminds me of eating here with Marika.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0226.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “W-With Marika?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I stopped eating and leaned forward. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0227.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Was Marika part of the Disciplinary Committee too?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Yes. She was my predecessor as head of the Disciplinary Committee. We used to discuss school order a lot together.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “It was a lot of work but good times. Marika was called ‘Yuki Hime’ and was always trying to help someone—such a kind person.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Whenever she spoke, it was worrying about this person or wanting to help that person—a gentle ‘Princess’ who cared more than anyone else.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria’s words warmed something deep inside me. ]])

    MSG([[ The Marika she described is just as I know her. Kind-hearted and always worried about others. ]])

    MSG([[ Even at Yuriai Private Academy, Marika hasn’t changed at all. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “That’s why... she must have suffered.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0228.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Eh?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A dark shadow fell over Daria’s face. It looked like regret. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Since the school became co-ed a year ago, there have been many problems involving the boys’ division. Marika struggled to handle them, but couldn’t keep up.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0229.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Wh-What kind of problems happened!? Was Marika okay!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Sorry, but I can’t tell a regular student like you the details. Of course, I’ll share what I can though, so have some water and calm down.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria flatly rejected my question. She probably knows information only a ‘Princess’ can. ]])

    MSG([[ It would be no use pushing for answers and raising suspicion. Frustrating as it is, I should back off here. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “For over a hundred years it was a girls-only sanctuary. When boys entered, a ton of problems piled up.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “In the end, the boys’ division even did things bordering on sexual harassment. If someone didn’t suspend them, it could have turned into a big scandal.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Marika, as the head ‘Princess,’ took on all that burden herself... She still smiled, but those responsibilities must have weighed on her.” ]])

    MSG([[ I was struck silent by the truth behind the boys’ division suspension that Daria revealed. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika put the seniors on suspension not on her own will but representing the entire academy’s will. That is so like her, with her strong sense of responsibility. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0230.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “W-Why would she go through so much...? Just because she’s a ‘Princess,’ it’s wrong to suffer that much.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Erika-kun, becoming a ‘Princess’ means bearing someone else’s ‘ideal.’ That’s what it is.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0231.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “To bear someone else’s ‘ideal’...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Tell me then: in these two weeks, have you been able to let anyone hear your complaints?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0232.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah—” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, I haven’t vented to anyone except Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ Right now, I’m working silently to meet others’ expectations. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s all because I don’t want those who admire me to be disappointed. I can’t let myself complain. ]])

    MSG([[ And Marika never showed weakness in front of me, either. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe she hid her struggles so as not to disappoint me, who looks up to her...? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I called you out for two reasons. One was to ask if you truly have the resolve to become a ‘Princess.’” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “The resolve to keep playing the role of someone’s ‘ideal.’” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria fixed her powerful gaze on me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//CI：ダリアのBU真剣、目元切り抜き 010
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG016aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201, 0, -15)
    SET_CUTIN_01_S(230, 500)

    MSG([[ Her piercing eyes still felt as intense as ever—almost hypnotic, as if they could steal my soul. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I... am—” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I touched the brooch on my chest and took a deep breath. I already knew my answer. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0234.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I will become a ‘Princess’ like Marika.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I looked back into Daria’s eyes and said firmly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0235.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I came to this academy to catch up to Marika and become strong enough to protect her.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0236.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I’m still weak and inexperienced, but no one will ever surpass my feelings.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

RESET_CUTIN_01(230, 500)

    MSG([[ That’s right. No matter how hard the path to becoming a ‘Princess’ is, my feelings won’t change. ]])

    MSG([[ On the contrary, finally there’s hope in my investigation. The reason Marika hasn’t awakened must be related to her duties as a ‘Princess.’ ]])

    MSG([[ If I become a ‘Princess,’ I’ll understand her feelings more deeply and surely find some clue. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Hehe, your face is becoming more and more likeable. How about going to the infirmary bed for some post-meal exercise?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0237.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Beds aren’t for exercising.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Eh?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0238.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “It’s not ‘eh’!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “That’s a shame. Hiyu next to you is already fast asleep, though...” ]])

    MSG([[ Then I noticed that Hiyu had been unusually quiet for a while now. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG016ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,0)
    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “S-piii... s-piii... sister’s thigh... licky-licky...” ]])

    MSG([[ Looking beside me, Hiyu was asleep while still holding the knife and fork. When did that happen!? ]])

    --//efect：画面全体が少しぼやける（まどろみ）
    FILTER_SCREEN(3)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I was starting to feel drowsy myself. My eyelids felt as heavy as lead. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0239.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (W-Wait, th-this is... s-something bad. Something bad is happening!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Alarms rang loudly inside my head. ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",0)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG016aa")
    --//BU：ダリア（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Now, aren’t you getting sleepy too? You can’t eat steak without water, after all.” ]])

    MSG([[ In Daria’s hand was the water bottle she had brought earlier! Come to think of it, she’s been insisting on drinking water for some time. ]])

    MSG([[ C-Could it be— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
